scripts.ios:build-development-debug: npx yarn env && npx eas build --platform ios --profile development-debug
scripts.ios:build-development-release: npx yarn env && npx eas build --platform ios --profile development-release
scripts.android:build-development-debug: npx yarn env && npx eas build --platform android --profile development-debug
scripts.android:build-development-release: npx yarn env && npx eas build --platform android --profile development-release
scripts.ios:build-staging-debug: npx yarn env:staging && npx eas build --platform ios --profile staging-debug
scripts.ios:build-staging-release: npx yarn env:staging && npx eas build --platform ios --profile staging-release
scripts.android:build-staging-debug: npx yarn env:staging && npx eas build --platform android --profile staging-debug
scripts.android:build-staging-release: npx yarn env:staging && npx eas build --platform android --profile staging-release
scripts.ios:build-production-debug: npx yarn env:production && npx eas build --platform ios --profile production-debug
scripts.ios:build-production-release: npx yarn env:production && npx eas build --platform ios --profile production-release
scripts.android:build-production-debug: npx yarn env:production && npx eas build --platform android --profile production-debug
scripts.android:build-production-release: npx yarn env:production && npx eas build --platform android --profile production-release
